const response0 = await client.index({
  index: 'my_index',
  id: '1',
  refresh: true,
  body: {
    product: 'chocolate',
    price: [
      20,
      4
    ]
  }
})
console.log(response0)

const response1 = await client.search({
  body: {
    query: {
      term: {
        product: 'chocolate'
      }
    },
    sort: [
      {
        price: {
          order: 'asc',
          mode: 'avg'
        }
      }
    ]
  }
})
console.log(response1)
